Título: problem about getting field: _id
Conflicts in put mapping only reported for properties field
JMX: Don't use node id and name as part of the jmx registration, use static org.elasticsearch
Better handling of shard failures
Optimize API: Don't execute concurrent optimize operations (shard level) on the same node
Better handling when a shard hits OOM
River: Failure to reallocate river to another node on rivers node failure
Local Gateway: Listed active shards on each node does apply index deletion
EC2 Zen Discovery: Automatically use the configured transport port to ping other nodes
Unicast Discovery: Concurrently connect to nodes to improve cases where some listed nodes are not up
Query DSL: Geo Distance Range filter
Query DSL: Allow to directly wrap a query with a constant_score query
Shard Allocation: Closed indices are not properly taken into account when rebalancing
Allow to delete a closed index
Versioning: Better handling of deletes - time based eviction
Mapping: Allow to set index to `no` for _id and _type
Weird error message on syntax error
Better support with _type is marked as not indexed, allowing to filter by type
Mapping: By default, don't index _id
Failure to recover a shard might cause loosing translog data (especially with no replicas)
Simplify Filter Cache Eviction Settings
Update Settings: Allow to dynamically set filter cache settings
Search request intermittent failures with has_child query/filter

(Small) optimization to has_child filter
Query DSL: Allow to set boost on has_child query
Search API: filter element should not be applied to global facets
Search: Optimize (perf) execution of global facets
And/Or Filter: Possible failure when inner filter does not match any docs
Possible failure to start a river after cluster restart
Failure when applying failed shards during local gateway allocation
Simplified Disable Flush operation
Query DSL: Fuzzy query support for numeric / date types
Analysis: Expose light and minimal language token filters
Analysis: Stop words config to allow for automatic _lang_ expansion
Analysis: All analysis components that accept stopwords to allow to load stopwords from a file
Mapping: Document's Field level boosting
Possible failure when using TransportClient (with sniffing)
Analysis: Pattern Tokenizer

wrong type returned by date_histogram

Search: Empty facets element causes search failures
Upgrade to jackson 1.8.1
Analysis: Phonetic filter to support `cologne` encoder
